list.item: The quire structure cannot be identified due to the poor condition of the Ms.

supportDesc.condition: The boards and the original sewing are torn off. Most of the folios are misplaced, many are missing (many texts are incomplete). Two leaves have been included in the folder of Ms. MCM-001a (a text concerning St. Thomas). Most of the leaves are affected by humidity, many have stains in the inner upper margins. Many leaves have been damaged by rodents.

layout.ab: the number of lines is very irregular: it can be e.g. also 31 (fol. 24r), 32 (fol. 4r), 42 (fol. 76v)
The upper line is written above the ruling (a few times also below: e.g., fols. 3v, 23r, 52v).
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Ruled lines have been left empty at the bottom: fols. 15r, 15v, 28r, 45r.

handDesc.handNote: The handwriting is characterized by tall, thick, right-sloping letters, tending to rounded and bent shapes. Possibly more than one hand was involved in writing (s. e.g., fols. 26v-27r).
- ዐ and the loops of መ have triangular shape
- ጵ has the 6th order marker set up on the vertical stroke at the top, oriented to the left (fols. 10va l.12, 48ra l.14)
- the upper horizontal strokes of some letters (e.g., መ ሠ ወ) are slanted to the left
- ፮ has the loop open, looking like “compressed” ፯ (e.g., fol. 7rb)
- ፪ has in some cases the loops not separated (e.g., fols. 3vb, 4vb); in fol. 23va l.16 the bottom loop is open.
- ፬ is triangular, downwards oriented (e.g., fol. 68rb)
- the crux ansata and coronis (together) are marking the beginning of texts (fol. 13v)
- sentence dividers are accompanied by the paragraph signs.

decoDesc.decoNote: Fol. 1r (incipit page of Text I-1): coloured (red, black), ornamental band, with three pendants all reaching the middle of the text, with decorations on the top extending to the upper margin of the page (interlaces).

Fol. 34r (incipit page of Text I-7): coloured (red, yellow, black), ornamental band, with three pendants all reaching the bottom of the text, with decorations on the top extending to the upper margin of the page (interlaces, crux ansata).

binding.decoNote: Both boards are missing. Two pairs of sewing stations.
